page.title: 16SCHOOL IN SHEFFIELD
page.content: I go to{Westways Middle School}which is in an area of{Sheffield}called {Crookes.}In our school there are 8 classes and the children are 8-12 years old. There is also a lower school{(Westways First School)}where the children start at 4 years old. I like school and I like doing the work that the teachers set out for us. There are 25 children in my class and we sit at desks made to hold 2 children. The desks have inkwells which we don't use because we write with pencils. Our teacher sets the desks out in tables of about 8 children. I don't like the way that the desks are set out, I'd like them to be in twos. The chairs are hard plastic and they hurt your bottom. The old chairs were wooden - they were even worse!
